remarks: The coefficient vector of multiplication in the univariate polynomial ring, at indices high enough that at most one component can be active in the sum.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1mul3.s $e |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1mul3.t $e |- .xb = ( .r ` Y ) $.
coe1mul3.u $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
coe1mul3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
coe1mul3.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
coe1mul3.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
coe1mul3.f1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
coe1mul3.f2 $e |- ( ph -> I e. NN0 ) $.
coe1mul3.f3 $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` F ) <_ I ) $.
coe1mul3.g1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
coe1mul3.g2 $e |- ( ph -> J e. NN0 ) $.
coe1mul3.g3 $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` G ) <_ J ) $.
coe1mul3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( coe1 ` ( F .xb G ) ) ` ( I + J ) ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` I ) .x. ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` J ) ) ) $.
